00020 //Posiciones (en bytes)
00021 #define POS_ARP_TIPOHARDWARE    0
00022 #define POS_ARP_TIPOPROTOCOLO   2
00023 #define POS_ARP_TAMHARDWARE             4
00024 #define POS_ARP_TAMPROTOCOLO    5
00025 #define POS_ARP_OP                              6
00026 #define POS_ARP_ETHERNETORIGEN  8
00027 #define POS_ARP_IPORIGEN                14
00028 #define POS_ARP_ETHERNETDESTINO 18
00029 #define POS_ARP_IPDESTINO               24
00030 
00031 //Tamaños de los campos (en bytes)
00032 #define LON_ARP_TIPOHARDWARE    2
00033 #define LON_ARP_TIPOPROTOCOLO   2
00034 #define LON_ARP_TAMHARDWARE             1
00035 #define LON_ARP_TAMPROTOCOLO    1
00036 #define LON_ARP_OP                              2
00037 #define LON_ARP_ETHERNETORIGEN  6
00038 #define LON_ARP_IPORIGEN                4
00039 #define LON_ARP_ETHERNETDESTINO 6
00040 #define LON_ARP_IPDESTINO               4
00041 
00042 #define MAPA_DINAMICO                   3
00043 
00044 //Códigos de operación (estan invertidos para
00045 //no tener que hacer InvierteWord todo el rato)
00046 #define PETICION                                0x0100
00047 #define RESPUESTA                               0x0200

00056 class ARP  
00057 {
00058 private:
00059         unsigned short int      _tipohardware;
00060         unsigned short int      _tipoprotocolo;
00061         unsigned char           _tamhardware;
00062         unsigned char           _tamprotocolo;
00063         unsigned short int      _op;
00064         unsigned char           _ethorigen[LON_ARP_ETHERNETORIGEN];
00065         unsigned char           _iporigen[LON_ARP_IPORIGEN];
00066         unsigned char           _ethdestino[LON_ARP_ETHERNETDESTINO];
00067         unsigned char           _ipdestino[LON_ARP_IPDESTINO];
00068         unsigned char           _arp[28];
00069         
00070         void                            _mostrarMAC(unsigned char[LON_ARP_ETHERNETORIGEN]);
00071         void                            _mostrarIP(unsigned char[LON_ARP_IPORIGEN]);
00072 
00073 public:
00074         ARP();
00078         ARP(unsigned char[28]);
00082         ARP(unsigned char ipo[LON_ARP_IPORIGEN], unsigned char[LON_ARP_IPDESTINO],unsigned char[LON_ARP_ETHERNETDESTINO],int operacion);
00083         virtual ~ARP();
00084 
00085         //Getters
00086         unsigned short int      getTipoHardware();
00087         unsigned short int      getTipoProtocolo();
00088         unsigned char           getTamHardware();
00089         unsigned char           getTamProtocolo();
00090         unsigned short int      getOp();
00091         unsigned char*          getMacOrigen();
00092         unsigned char*          getIpOrigen();
00093         unsigned char*          getMacDestino();
00094         unsigned char*          getIpDestino();
00095 
00096         //Setters
00097         void                            setTipoHardware(unsigned short int);
00098         void                            setTipoProtocolo(unsigned short int);
00099         void                            setTamHardware(unsigned char);
00100         void                            setTamProtocolo(unsigned char);
00101         void                            setOp(unsigned short int);
00102         void                            setMacOrigen(unsigned char[LON_ARP_ETHERNETORIGEN]);
00103         void                            setIpOrigen(unsigned char[LON_ARP_IPORIGEN]);
00104         void                            setMacDestino(unsigned char[LON_ARP_ETHERNETDESTINO]);
00105         void                            setIpDestino(unsigned char[LON_ARP_IPDESTINO]);
00106 
00107         //Utilidades
00109         unsigned short int      toShortInt(unsigned char, unsigned char);
00111         unsigned char*          toArray();
00113         void                            enviar(unsigned char[LON_ARP_IPDESTINO]);
00115         void                            InvierteWord(unsigned short int &a);
00117         void                            mostrar();
00118 };
